hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Ushara' that his father said:"I said: "O Messenger of Allah, is slaughtering only in the throat or upper chest?" He said: 'If you stab it in the thigh, that will suffice,"'(Daif)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الْمُتَرَدِّيَةِ فِي الْبِئْرِ الَّتِي لاَ يُوصَلُ إِلَى حَلْقِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Mention Of An Animal That Fell Into A Well And Its Throat Cannot Be Reached
